info.title: Kaspa REST-API server
info.description: This server is to communicate with kaspa network via REST-API

get.description: Get balance for a given kaspa address
Lists all open utxo for a given kaspa address

schema.title: Response Get Utxos For Address Addresses  Kaspaaddress  Utxos Get

post.description: Lists all open utxo for a given kaspa address

schema.title: Response Get Utxos For Addresses Addresses Utxos Post

get.summary: Get Virtual Selected Parent Blue Score
get.description: Returns the blue score of the sink
Get block information for a given block id
Lists block beginning from a low hash (block id).
Lists blocks of a given blueScore

schema.title: Response Get Blocks From Bluescore Blocks From Bluescore Get

get.description: Alias for /info/blockdag
Get Kaspa BlockDAG information
Get $KAS coin supply information
Get circulating amount of $KAS token as numerical value
Get total amount of $KAS token as numerical value
Get some information for kaspad instance, which is currently connected.

Get fee estimate from Kaspad. For all buckets, feerate values represent fee/mass of a transaction in `sompi/gram` units.
Given a feerate value recommendation, calculate the required fee by taking the transaction mass and multiplying it by feerate: `fee = feerate * mass(tx)`
Returns the current price for Kaspa in USD.

schema.title: Response Get Price Info Price Get

post.description:
This endpoint checks if addresses have had any transaction activity in the past.
It is specifically designed for HD Wallets to verify historical address activity.

schema.title: Response Get Addresses Active Addresses Active Post

get.summary: Get Full Transactions For Address Page
get.description:
Get all transactions for a given address from database.
And then get their related full transaction data

parameters.description: The max number of records to get. For paging combine with using 'before/after' from oldest previous result. Use value of X-Next-Page-Before/-After as long as header is present to continue paging. The actual number of transactions returned for each page can be > limit.

schema.title: Limit
schema.description: The max number of records to get. For paging combine with using 'before/after' from oldest previous result. Use value of X-Next-Page-Before/-After as long as header is present to continue paging. The actual number of transactions returned for each page can be > limit.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Only include transactions with block time before this (epoch-millis)

schema.title: Before
schema.description: Only include transactions with block time before this (epoch-millis)

parameters.name: before

parameters.description: Only include transactions with block time after this (epoch-millis)

schema.title: After
schema.description: Only include transactions with block time after this (epoch-millis)

parameters.name: after

parameters.description: Use this parameter if you want to fetch the TransactionInput previous outpoint details. Light fetches only the adress and amount. Full fetches the whole TransactionOutput and adds it into each TxInput.

get.description:
Checks node and database health by comparing blue score and sync status.
Returns health details or 503 if the database lags by ~10min or no nodes are synced.
Get $KAS price and market cap. Price info is from coingecko.com

schema.title: Response Get Marketcap Info Marketcap Get

parameters.description: Replace an existing transaction in the mempool

schema.title: Replacebyfee
schema.description: Replace an existing transaction in the mempool

parameters.name: replaceByFee

post.description:
This function calculates and returns the mass of a transaction, which is essential for determining the minimum fee. The mass calculation takes into account the storage mass as defined in KIP-0009.

Note: Be aware that if the transaction has a very low output amount or a high number of outputs, the mass can become significantly large.

get.description: EXPERIMENTAL - EXPECT BREAKING CHANGES: Get virtual chain transactions by blue score.

schema.title: Response Get Virtual Chain Transactions Virtual Chain Get
